content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Rumors of a cure begin to circulate as a monstrous snowstorm approaches NYC. Sent to recover the potential antidote, your chopper is brought down leaving you cold, hungry and stripped of gear, forcing you to find warmth and scavenge for materials. You must search for the cure in these unforgiving conditions, beware of other dangers and find a way to extract it from the chaos. Our survival depends on it.

New Gameplay and Features:

• Find shelter, fires and craft warm clothes to resist the cold as long as possible.
• Look out for food and snack bars to restore your health. Water will also be a necessity as your agent becomes dehydrated, affecting vision.
• Enable PvP or PvE modes in Survival with up to 24 other players.
• Faster, and dangerously well prepared, the Hunter is a deadly new enemy who will always be one step ahead of you.


Use of PSN and SEN account are subject to the Terms of Service and User Agreement and applicable privacy policy (see terms at sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service & sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/privacy-policy).
Online features may be terminated at any time.
*Online multiplayer requires a PlayStation®Plus membership.

Online Play (Required)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

attributes.name: Tom Clancy’s The Division® Expansion II: Survival
